page.title: 01Ropley - General survey
page.content: This block contains most of the villages of Ropley, Monkwood & West Tisted & lies between the A31 & A32. The roads are mainly quiet winding lanes with high banks and hedges & the highest point is 191.9m. above sea level. It is mainly rolling landscape with trees & woodland & fields of grass & grain crops. There are two big estates & many small farms. Ropley has a population of 1500 people & there is a primary school for 5-11 year olds with 160 pupils in 5 classes.There are churches in Ropley & West Tisted & a mission hall in Monkwood.There is one small shop in Ropley & another in West Tisted but most main shopping is done in supermarkets in neighbouring towns. Most people travel to work outside the village by private car.
